items.summary: Fix the Add Manga dialog layout so the primary submit button remains reliably clickable after entering metadata (no overlapping/hidden layers blocking pointer events). Update the dialogâ€™s internal layout to use a stable flex column structure (header + scrollable body + footer) where only the form body scrolls and the footer remains fully interactive.

Eliminate the user-visible warning/error condition "Actor not available" during Add Manga by preventing submission until the backend actor is ready and providing clear, English UI feedback when the actor is still initializing. Ensure the Add Manga submit button and mutation cannot run while the actor is null/initializing.
